JADE Semantics Add-on Cook-Book


This cook-book is intended to provide a repository of useful skeletons of JSA applications. This should help developers not starting from scratch, which may be sometimes harrowing...

We hope this cook-book will be completed on-line, with the help of all the JADE community. To contribute or suggest ideas, please send an email to us.


[1]

An empty JSA-based agent. Or what you can already do, without coding much.


Have fun with the JSA and send us feed-back!
Thanks for your support,

The JSA team @ France Telecom
